actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Russian Federation should be strongly condemned for its plan to provide nuclear technology to Iran, and that such nuclear transfer would make Russia ineligible under terms for the Freedom Support Act.

summary.text: Urges condemnation of the Russian Federation for continuing to implement a commercial agreement to provide Iran with nuclear technology. Declares that such implementation renders Russia ineligible for assistance under terms of the Freedom Support Act.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that the Russian Federation should be strongly condemned for its plan to provide nuclear technology to Iran, and that such nuclear transfer would make Russia ineligible under terms for the Freedom Support Act.
